Changelog¶

v0.1.7¶

New Modules¶

  • pd.DataFrame module created.

New Features¶

  • The toFeatureCollection() extended method for pd.DataFrame classes was created.

  • The scale() extended method for ee.Image and ee.ImageCollection classes now supports Sentinel-3 and most MODIS products.

Improvements¶

  • Multiple Exceptions were added to most methods.
